name: Phase Monster
description: The Phase Monster is a large creature with a strong physique and magical traits; it can shift between a monstrous form and that of a small goat.
memorable: Its ability to create illusions and frighten foes with a terrifying scream makes it a unique adversary.
goals: To ambush opponents and escape detection while using its abilities to frighten and confuse.
relations: It may be found in the company of other monstrosities or magical creatures.
environment: Typically encountered in mystical or wild areas where it can use its agility and magical traits to its advantage.
strengths: Strong physical ability allows for effective melee attacks, while its magical illusion adds an extra layer of defense.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma hinder complex strategies and social interactions.
attacks: It can unleash a devastating multiattack with its horns and claws, particularly effective against prone targets.
most_powerful_ability: Blood-Curdling Scream that frightens enemies, forcing them to flee.
senses: It has darkvision, allowing it to see in low-light conditions, and a passive Perception score of 14.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, enhancing its ability to detect threats and remain hidden.
additional_information: Mirror Image ability makes it harder to hit.
Shapeshifting into a goat allows for tactical versatility.
Blood-curdling scream affects all within 60 feet.
Can deal extra damage if the target is prone.
High Strength and Constitution for durability in combat.
test_queries: large monster that can fly and scare
monstrous in goat form with magical traits
creature with an illusory defense method
agile monster that frightens nearby enemies
phase monster with a devastating scream ability
